cause.description:
We fund & influence research, provide support for families, and increase awareness of MLD.
http://www.mldfoundation.org/
By joining this cause and reading about MLD you are helping people around the world with MLD, a rare neuro-metabolic genetic condition.
1 in 100 of us is a carrier for MLD! Don't let it devastate your family like it has so many others.
The MLD Foundation provides compassion, support and hope gives hope to familes with MLD by connecting them to other families, providing up to date information, and working with researchers, regulators and legislators.
Thank you for your interest! Please tell a friend!
1. facilitating Compassion for families
2. increasing Awareness
3. funding & influencing Research
4. promoting Education
cause.mission: Compassion, Awareness, Research, & Education -- We want people to learn about Metachromatic Leukodystrophy (MLD)
